main.name: Janice Tsai
main.description: Interested in backend and fascinated with using technology to solve problems that will truly make an impact
main.bio: Aside from coding and learning new ways of solving problems that make an impact, I enjoy hiking, music, and being outdoors.

education.description: Developer at Nova, Tech for Good, Member of Women in Engineering, Co-President and Musical Director of Road to Damascus A Cappella
education.pastClubs: Bruin Entrepreneurs, Bruin Home Solutions, ACM TeachLA, Creative Labs, Bruin Hyperloop

education.description: Learned programming, 3D modeling/design, machining, art, physics through hands-on projects. Attended Bay Area Maker Faire 2019 to showcase senior capstone project to thousands of people.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Delivered four user facing features for Tableau Server and Tableau Online

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Built a charting application that monitors the health of networks and servers, providing live statistics and visualization. Significantly reduced query and number of API calls by more than 80%. Developed REST API to automate manual process of populating a dashboard. Implemented bug fixtures and added sorting by category, duplication of emails, and send notification abilities to an email building and managing tool.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained a platform that helps small-medium sized businesses find manufacturers for their tangible products and manage their supply chain needs. Built pages and dashboards from UI/UX designs. Implemented customer-driven chat interface on landing page. Condensed page response times through optimization.

extracurriculars.title: Software Developer
extracurriculars.description: Working on backend and admin platform for an iOS application that allows victims of assault to connect and chat with others. Analyzing point in time data and mapping out a solution for a nonprofit organization to reach their goal of providing for more than 6,000 homeless individuals.

extracurriculars.title: Co-President/Musical Director
extracurriculars.description: Overseeing an a cappella group, leading rehearsals, arranging sheet music, and organizing concerts and gigs

extracurriculars.title: Operations Board Member
extracurriculars.description: Facilitated and planned weekly workshops and presentations for UCLA students to learn about entrepreneurship, venture capital, and finance.

extracurriculars.company: Bruin Home Solutions | The Data Grid
extracurriculars.title: Backend Software Developer
extracurriculars.description: Created a centralized data management application for auditors across campus. Wrote unit and api tests using jest and supertest. Implemented query validation for database schema.

extracurriculars.company: Assocation of Computing Machinery | Teach LA
extracurriculars.title: Software Developer
extracurriculars.description: Developing an interactive module for students to learn tech related topics, including how the internet works.

projects.title: The Data Grid
